https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5kvr2gx6j3XjueQfkYsGPqvGSQ.jpg Budhia Singh – Born To Run is an Indian biographical sports film directed by Soumendra Padhi. It is based on Budhia Singh, who ran 48 marathons — one of which was from Bhubaneshwar to Puri, when he was a five-year-old. Budhia Singh: Born to Run
